reviewTitle: Real value for money ,with stunning views.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The whole of the resort lived up to its name as it was very artsy. There was a choice of American and Continental breakfast and also had noodles on the menu .The pool was beautiful ,overlooking the natural forests of Ubud. The resorts boasts a museum which is spectacular and the owner was kind enough to give us a full tour and explanations of all his findings.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The resort is about 10 minutes drive away from city Centre, however a taxi was easily accessible to move around in Ubud.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The property is located In middle of Ubud surrounded by nature. Staff were very helpful + friendly. Good hospitality. Will recommend for those who love nature.

reviewTitle: Great location outside of the business of Ubud. Good value for the money.

The included breakfast is also nice with the best views.  1 restaurant located on the property.

reviewTextParts.Liked: the owner was amazing, he is very friendly, kind and helpful. he helped us to talk to our Crab driver to guide him to come to the right address to pick us up, he was so kind to let us enter to his family temple, he and his wife kindly dressed up with appropriate clothes to enter the temple. the hotel is so peaceful and calm very nice place to relax and enjoy the beauty of nature. we highly recommend this beautiful place. thank you so much to the owner and his family for the help and kindness, if we come back to Bali we will definitely staying here again🙏🙂

reviewTextParts.Liked: The service was great, as we arrived we rented a scooter and it arrived in 20-40 minutes. The big pool was really nice, in my opinion it could use a couple of lights in that area or some lights in the pool, after a long day trek in Ubud area it's nice a swim, however it's really dark there. Definitely a must try resort.

The pool could use some reconditioning, there's some moss and some of the kit came out, don't get me wrong, we stayed in the pool more than 6 hours in our last day, it's really great.

reviewTitle: Not bad for a Short Stay.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Those who like the Art Resort concept may like this property.  Enough Parking Space.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Main door has peep holes, worn out towels, limited breakfast, Keys are not working. AC not cooling enough because of large room and split AC.

The accommodation did not meet our expectations.  The hotel was marketed to me as a 5-star hotel, but in reality the accommodation was more like a hostel.  Private villas are certainly better than just a room, but still. We didn't get warm water from the shower on two nights. The host offered free water bottles, but each time they were pre-opened bottles. The air conditioning was not working properly, room was too hot to sleep. We were always required to leave the room key at the reception if we left the hotel (this is a nice idea, but the keys were available to anyone in the open space.) We decided to go somewhere else to spend our vacation. Although we informed the Tanah Merah host about all the problems but they saw no problem at all and did not refund anything for the remaining nights.. In summary, I could say that the place had a lot of flaws to be 5-star level and basic things have not been fixed, for example lighting and broken tiles in the swimming pool etc.

propertyResponse:
Dear Tiina, 
Greetings from Tanah Merah Art Resort...
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We sincerely apologize that your experience at Tanah Merah did not meet your expectations. Your comments are truly valuable to us as we strive to provide the best possible service to our guests.
We are disappointed to hear about the issues you encountered during your stay, such as the lack of warm water, pre-opened water bottles, malfunctioning air conditioning, and security concerns regarding leaving room keys at reception. Rest assured that we take these matters seriously and will address them with our team to ensure improvements are made.
Once again, we apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate you bringing these matters to our attention. Should you decide to give us another chance in the future, we would welcome the opportunity to make it right for you.
Best regards, 
Osin Landek

reviewTitle: It takes one bad apple to spoil the barrel

reviewTextParts.Liked: The one great thing about the property? The view of the jungle, which you can get from other neighbouring properties.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
I agree with other reviewers that said the great reviews must have been bought...
A 4D3N stay means 96 hours on the property, yet Manager Nurah was insistent that the in-house museum & gallery would not have sufficient interest for a tour. The statement was made mid stay. When I mentioned I would gather sufficient interest, Nurah made things extraordinarily difficult by restricting the timing for all 5 parties to only a 1000-1200hr period on 1 particular day.
Lots of politics within the hotel, many other issues with Nurah & Ketut with the same bullying stance. Do you wanna deal with politics during a vacation?
The Panoramic Villa?
Plenty of loose tiles, dangerous for anyone walking around barefoot. Filthy bed causing itches nightly. Remaining amenities are usable, but not passable.

reviewTitle: Heavenly paradise and a great place to recuperate

reviewTextParts.Liked: I absolutely love this hotel. I’ve travelled to 45 countries and stayed in loads of hotels. This is my favourite place in the world. I’ve been twice this year and I’ll definitely be back. It’s peaceful, beautiful and has a magical atmosphere. It’s a perfect place to just chill. But equally there are plenty of things to do in the area if you want to get out and about.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: A shuttle into town and back would be good. I read in reviews on Tripadvisor that they did this. But when I asked them they didn’t know what I was talking about. It’s easy and cheap to get a taxi into the centre of Ubud but I found it hard to find a taxi to get back I only found one taxi rank where they totally overcharged me.

reviewTitle: Good for a one night stay to enjoy the pools and sunset.

reviewTextParts.Liked: I enjoyed the little cottage I stayed in (the porch was great for relaxing) and spent time at one of the two pools while watching the sunset. The location of the dining room and pool, in relation to my accommodation, was convenient and easy.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: There was a lot of noise in the morning as the staff was gathering for the day. Due to the style of the little cottage I was in, noise carried very easily. Loud talking/laughing, and moving of gardening equipment were easily heard at 7:00 a.m. The light near the bed did not work and there was only one outlet for charging my electronics. The art museum attached to the resort was a huge draw for me, yet I found out it was only open once a month and for large groups, so it was not possible for me to see it. The rooftop was not finished and was under construction. There was not a lot of information within the room about the resort, which left me with little options other than to go back down to Ubud.

Staff were very friendly and helpful, we used the laundry service and it was very quick and good service. Swimming pool was great and we hiked to the waterfall one morning. The area was up a bit of a hill but taxi drivers didn’t mind picking up from there. The surrounding village and rice paddies were stunning.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The entire property was very quiet during our stay (this could have been seasonal) with not many other guests. The same went for the on site restaurants. The sky bar closed at 9pm which was a shame! The spa was open by appointment for massages - this was a little unclear.

reviewTextParts.Liked: I thoroughly enjoyed the tranquility of the area which greatly contributed to a relaxing experience. It felt like Boeing in m middel of the forrest. The pool was lovely, and the cabin impressed me with its spacious layout, including its own private location nesr the pool. The overall appearance of the hotel was also very appealing. Additionally, the surroundings of the hotel were quite pleasant.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: I found the restaurant's food and beverage pricing to be quite high. Given the quality and service, it might be worthwhile to reassess your pricing strategy. The breakfast was adequate at first, but I noticed a lack of variety over several days. Adding more options could greatly improve the morning experience for guests. Although there were many mosquitoes in the cabin, the staff did provide covers and mosquito coils, which helped. However, making the cabins less open could further prevent mosquitoes from entering so easily. Regarding the location, although it was a bit far from the center, traveling by scooter was convenient and the route was scenic, enhancing the overall experience.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Amazing location. If you wanna be close to nature, this place is definitely a must visit.  Near the hotel is located waterfall it just a breathtaking place.
Rooms are big, and according to the "Indonesian standards," it is very clean. Hotel staff are open, and always happy to help.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Long waiting time for hot water.

reviewTitle: a fantastic museum - storry about Mads Lange

reviewTextParts.Liked: A nice place and good breakfast

The Property is located away from the rush of Ubud. Next to tropical lush forest with a gorge running behind. Very peaceful place. BUT the most interesting aspect is the whole property is an art museum with the property itself an art. I would recommend everyone to explore it and read up on Jungle Dentist / Dr. Peter Bloch.
All the staffs are excellent and the resort manager, Mr Nura is the best. We loved most of the experience including home made ice cream cones.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Would be more eco friendly to have a jet wash to clean your butt. Pool could be cleaner. Extremely slow internet.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The property itself is lovley, in a lovley quiet area with no noise at all, the staff are unbelievably friendly, the fully English speaking owner is amazing along with all of his staff, each time you arrive they remember your name and hand you your key which is a very nice gesture. there is a private waterfall with unbelievable views of the jungle this was an unbelievable experience (worth coming just for this) the pools are lovley and it is not too far from the city centre. i love it and would come back
reviewTextParts.Disliked: the shower was a little cold, maybe just mine

reviewTitle: When I come to Ubud, this is going to be my home for sure for the time I stay in Bali.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
I just like everything about the property, the scenic location , the villas nestled in the forest with a mesmerizing water fall down right below the property which is like a 7 mins walk.
I had plans to go out after i check in  but I was so mesmerized by the location of this property that I actually cancelled my plans and stayed at the property whole day.
Monkey forest was a 10 mins ride from property.
Kintami look out was a 35 mins ride
Ayung river rafting was also with 25 mins distance
Bali swing was alao within 30 mins
Tegalalnanf rice fields and Tegenananum waterfall was also not very far
Loved my time at Tannah Merah Art Resort.
The owner Peter and Manager Ngurah were so nice and welcoming. They were very accommodating and also arrange a scooter for me at a very short notice.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: A little on the inside and away from centerpoint   but easy access on bike or car in

reviewTitle: We extended our stay as we really enjoyed the relaxing atmosphere of the resort.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Nice getaway from the 'rat race' (Ubud). Staff was very accommodating. Cooked a special soup that's not on the menu. If you wake up early enough, the monkeys come around to entertain. Nice view from the rooftop. We also enjoyed the guided tour of the gallery. Thanks to Peter and his staff!

roomInfo: Bintang Suite 1 - Villa with Private Pool
reviewTitle: Stunning views, away from the busy tourist areas and exceptional staff always happy to chat / help.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The photos don't do the resort justice - it's far bigger and has better views than the photos can capture. It's on a cliffside where you can hear the calming river and see the beautiful lush green forest.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Most would say it's a bit far from the city, but it's perfect for those that want some quiet AWAY from the city! Apart from that, it's an older establishment; however, has been maintained well.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Breakfast was good
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
The aggressive art works in the room and corridors were disturbing and creepy.
It didn’t have a hospitable feel. The staff were tense and seemed to have been trained to monitor and follow guests rather than make us feel welcome.
Meals at the two restaurants were charged in US dollars, which was unusual and seemed like a money grab.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location in the hills, very beautiful.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: A breathtaking jungle setting - unfortunately, one of the few positive things we can say about our experience. The panoramic view room advertisement was misleading, we were greeted by a room containing two double beds and little else. The patio furniture was beautiful, yet uncomfortable. The bathroom was dark, damp and dirty, with tea and coffee amenities situated next to the toilet. We were eager to explore other rooms - the concierge kindly informed us our room was “not the nicest”, and that we could upgrade to a premium room with private pool for an extra $120 AUD per night. We decided to upgrade as the premium room was a drastic improvement, yet the photos attached represent the general lack of cleanliness. We felt the on premises restaurants and bars were overpriced and of poor quality. Overall, the setting was stunning - but the features of the resort left us spending the vast majority of our stay off premises.

reviewTitle: Overall it was ok as we spent most of our time in Ubud centre. I wouldn’t stay here again.

reviewTextParts.Disliked:
The whole property needs to be upgraded. We booked a standard room but after inspection we upgraded to a Villa .
The pool was small but clean. There were no parasols by the loungers. It was hot and there was no shade around the pool.
There were limited choice for breakfast but it was good. The staff weren’t able to cope with simple requests. We ordered American breakfast which comes with eggs of your choice, hash brown and grilled tomatoes . Both days we had to ask for tomatoes and on the 2nd day we were given raw tomatoes which was served after we had finished eating.
The lighting in the rooms is poor. A lick of white paint on the walls is all that’s needed to brighten the rooms. The table provided in the room was tiny . There was no where to put on your laptop if you wanted to work. There were no plug points to  plug the kettle in . Had to disconnect the lamp to have a cuppa.
The Mesh on the windows is all broken and lets the mosquitos in.
We had so many ants behind our bed and had to ask the staff to spray the room to get
rid of them.

propertyResponse:

Our team strives to provide exceptional service to all our guests, so we are disappointed to hear that we fell short in meeting your expectations. We will address your concern with our staff to ensure better service moving forward.
Thank you again for your feedback, and we hope that you will consider staying with us again in the future so we have the opportunity to provide you with a more enjoyable experience.

reviewTitle: Good enough for 3 stars if you stay in the hotel. Very nice location and friendly staff.

reviewTextParts.Liked: We loved the location and friendly staff
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The hotel was not 5 star. 3 stars is a better rating for this hotel. Restaurant food was average. No bartender so a Bacardi cola was not possible. Winelist was very limited, with just 2 wines. The room was a good 3-star due to the size and we overlooked the forest. We didn't stay in the villas, perhaps these were 5-star.

reviewTitle: Affordable stay but a lot of downsides!

reviewTextParts.Liked: The location was quite secluded from the rest of ubud and thus more quiet and relaxed!
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Some buildings of the property didn’t fit the overall aesthetic of the old building. The rooms are underwhelming and give of a hostel vibe. The rooms were not cleaned properly and one of the two pools was not usable, the other was a bit dirty. Our biggest problem with the resort was the fact that we were offered a 1l bottle of complimentary water a day, after two days of horrible diarrhoea we noticed that the waterbottle are not sealed, overfilled and standing in the bathroom next to the sink. We have strong suspicion that they got refilled with tap water from the bathroom sink!
The prices from the restaurant are absolutely ridiculous and take advantage from the fact that all other restaurants are a bit far away but it’s still cheaper to order full dinner for 2 people from grab than to eat a single meal in the hotel restaurant!

reviewTitle: Чудесный вид на джунгли и бассейн

reviewTextParts.Liked: Шикарная территория. Виллу выбирала исключительно из-за потрясающего вида. Бассейн прекрасен и я всегда была там одна. В кафе работает невероятно приветливая и клиентоориентированная девочка, к сожалению, я не запомнила ее имя, ей отдельная благодарность за внимание, которое отчасти компенсировало для меня дефицит вегетарианских блюд в меню. Интересный факт: прямо под отелем водопад, туда можно ходить хоть каждый день. Но. Из-за водопада очень шумно спать, учитывайте это и берите с собой беруши.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Мало вегетарианских блюд в меню, а другие кафе далеко, поэтому я было немного голодной.

reviewTitle: Very nice and definitely a great deal!

reviewTextParts.Liked: The resort is in a tranquil and beautiful location.  The 2 pools both have a great view and sitting areas were very relaxing.  Breakfast, lunch and dinners were all good with fresh food and nice serving.  Staff was wonderful and bent over backward.  We missed the tour of the galleries but heard it was amazing!
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The facilities obviously need a bit more TLC but understandable due to CoVID shut down.  And, we wish the Sky Bar and other bar had been open.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Clean, friendly staff, good food
reviewTextParts.Disliked: If you don’t have a motorbike or a personal driver, it’s quite far from Ubud center. No way to come dizzy from Ubud during the night by foot.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Breakfest 3 options to choose from, quite good but make sure bacon is not 3 days old.2 pools, quiet, great views, relaxing place, big rooms.Food average, vegetarian soup exellent with bread.Good service, they bring everything to your room or pool area.Path down to river was very nice.Even wild monkeys visited us in pool area, that was nice :)
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Location is remote, thou we knew this. Taxi is cheap but can take hour to center ubud.Ubud center and sidewalks are terrible condition, nothing to do with Tanah Mera hotel i know.Cleaners dont visit rooms, specially when informed that no cleaning needed.Nothing missing but still littlebit annoying.

reviewTextParts.Liked: I’m like breakfast, hotel very quiet , clean . I love it 😍
Location and view
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
The resort is old.. needs renovation, fresh paint and pools need new cares.
The shower pressure was an abomination. You cant shampoo your hair properly.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
-daily yummy breakfast with the most spectacular, unreal view of the jungle
-the staff were the most friendly, personable people who take you in like family. So many sweet younger kids doing a summer job as well and everyone so friendly and willing to stop and chat or help with anything. Very good, warm people
-can't say enough about the view, relaxing nature, and interesting landscape with statues
-can hike down to a private waterfall
reviewTextParts.Disliked: -really difficult to set up a time to get to see the historic Indonesian artifacts in their museums. In the end, only got to see half of one and I think they have 3 museums. You have to tell the manager far in advance which was saddening since didn't get to do it

reviewTextParts.Liked: Views with an amazing swimming pool and spa and a very good affordable restaurant. That is a plus as it is opened from 7am to 10pm
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The bed weren't very comfy because they were two single mattresses together instead of a big one. You could feel the gap between the two mattresses.

reviewTitle: Very nice location to rest and enjoy the sound of the river and peace of the jungle

reviewTextParts.Liked: It’s location was stunning !and very very quite
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Cleanliness and service in the room

reviewTextParts.Liked: The place is beautiful and the owner has tried to make the place an art gallery which is very nice and is the way they sell the hotel ("Art Resort"), but unfortunately when we booked the hotel nobody told us that the art galleries were closed down so it was not possible to see the art at all. The restaurant had only half of the products they offered in the menu and the bar was also closed down. Swimming pool was nice but also need a bit of love, there was no any sunshade so it was quite difficult to enjoy the swimming pool. Rooms looked a bit old.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Art galleries closed down. Bar closed down. Restaurant had only a few options to choose from.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
A Pleasant Stay with Minor Room Issue
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Tanah Meraj art resort, and overall, it was a delightful experience. From the moment we arrived, the staff's warm hospitality made us feel welcomed and cared for. They were attentive, courteous, and always ready to assist with any queries we had during our stay. Kudos to the excellent staff who made our visit so memorable!
The location of the hotel was perfect for us. We were looking for a quiet place to stay during our visit to Ubud.
The size of the room we stayed in was impressive. It provided ample space to move around comfortably. The bed and pillows were comfortable.
The hotel's general facilities were quite good. We explored a little bit. Didn't use the poll but it seems amazing.
Our breakfast was fine, with good options and they even attended all the questions we had (one of our group has strong food allergies).
In conclusion, I highly recommend the stay for anyone visiting the area. The friendly and attentive staff, location, spacious rooms, and excellent facilities make it a good choice for accommodation.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: I must mention a minor issue that we encountered during our stay. One of the rooms we rented had a slight problem with humidity odor. While it wasn't overpowering, it was noticeable upon entering the room. As soon we turned the AC on it was gone. We didn't even try to change room for it and didn't notify the staff as it wasn't so strong. The offered AC and fan in each room.

reviewTitle: The room/ villa you get is not as per advertisement on booking.com

reviewTextParts.Liked: The view was really amazing. The breakfast wasn't that great and not many options. Pool was clean
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The room pictures indicate the existence of bathtub, and this was one of our main reasons to book this villa. However, there was no water in the bathtub, and we could not use it at all! We were told by the hotel management that they are saving water etc. for whatever reasons they are not willing to provide the bathtub to the customer they must inform the customer before the booking has been made. In booking.com the room is advertised with the bathtub, and this is not acceptable.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Everything was clean, super friendly staff, everything we needed was accessible
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Nothing at all

reviewTextParts.Disliked: Restaurant food and drinks prices were in usd and very very expensive for Bali

reviewTextParts.Liked: The room size was big and the staff was friendly.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Poor Breakfast, I used to skip them all.Was better to have it outside than inside, they should definitely reconsider their menu there.

reviewTitle: Average resort with nice pools and views but hygiene needs to be improved.

reviewTextParts.Liked: We liked the pools and generally the environment was stunning. Beautiful pools with the jungle views was what I expected from Bali.Breakfast was okay, we could choose from 5 types of breakfast and it was delicious. Breakfast was served in a nice place with a view of the fish and garden. Music was relaxing.Room was spacious and cleaners made our bed everyday.Staff is extremely nice and respectful.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: We had cockroaches in our room which was disgusting. Asked to change the room but our request was denied as apparently all the rooms were full.Horrible smell from the bathroom everyday. The pipes were stinking so badly, we wanted to vomit. The bathroom is not very well built so the water was not draining , bacteria was building in the bathroom and the smell was horrendous.My partner requested washing his clothes, which was returned clean but he got an allergic reaction on his back from the washing liquid they used. How do we know this? He still had 2 T-shirts from home . He wore it and his back was okay. Then he wore a t-shirt cleaned by the resort and whole back was red with pimples.The room was okay but we could hear the opening other people's rooms and it woke us up everyday so rooms are not soundproof at all. At some point I could hear a man vomiting in the middle of the night in the building.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Beautiful place to staff, lovely scenery and access to river was amazing. Very lovely staff and excellent service.

reviewTitle: Very disappointing. Cut our stay short.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The view from the infinity pool and the artwork.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
My husband and I were booked to spend 3 nights here but only stayed one due to some issues that arose.
The cleanliness was very poor. I don't know if they rushed our room since we arrived before check in. Upon arrival they said our room would be ready in half hr. We were happy to leave our bags and wait for check in time but since they said it could be done soon, we decided to wait around. An hr later no one had notified us, so we went to the lobby. The main lobby clerk  jumped on the phone to find out if our room was ready. At this point we felt well looked after and the man who welcomed us was friendly.
Unfortunately, the toilet had a significant pool of vomit or poo (brown substance) splashed around it and tampon wrappers on the floor. It wasn't easily spotted since the floor is pink marble-like. Upon closer inspection, you could see rims left around the sink suggesting these areas had been missed. We actually decided to clean it and not let it ruin our stay. I honestly didn't feel all that trusting that the cleaners could do a good enough job and if I did it myself, at least I knew it was disinfected.
We booked this place because it seemed like a quiet retreat but it was far from it. The views from the infinity pool are beautiful and there's lots of lovely architecture. But we were kept awake by a very bright light coming in through a window above the doorway that had no curtain and could not be turned off. We were also awakened by a cockerel at 4am, which continued all through the morning. We left at 9:30am and it was still going. I totally get that this is part of the lifestyle in Bali, and perhaps this wouldn't have bothered us too much if it wasn't for the room description saying 'soundproofing' which was why we chose to stay here. We barely get any sleep being new parents, so we specifically looked for a room that promised quiet.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location nice and the swimming pool had a nice view but online it looks more luxerious than in real life
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Too many noises at night and also the price is too high for what you get. I wouldn't call it a resort.....

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Странная оценка отеля 5* на Booking.  На  картах он 4*, а Островок его оценивает в 3*.  И вот это похоже на правду. Жили в номере в основном корпусе deluxe, возможно номера других категорий или виллы лучше.
Номер большой, но эта площадь бесполезна, балкон как в санатории в Ессентуках, с высокой бетонной перегородкой и окнами стеклопакетами.
Вода в душе есть, но надо долго минут 10-15 ждать горячую.
Завтраки нормальные по меню. Блюдо, сок, чай,  фрукты.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Цены в кафе и баре в долларах, даже не попробовали пойти. Бассейн грязноват.
Самая жесть это дверь в номер и коридор к номеру. Там отличнейшая аккустика, любой звук резонирует кратно, а дверь тонкая из алюминиевого профиля заполнение какой-то пластик вместо стекла.  В итоге что есть дверь что нет, все что происходит в коридоре прекрасно слышно в номере. Двери ещё гремят и скрепят. В итоге любой твой сосед как бы не старался, тебя разбудит. А некоторые не старались и так дверями хлопали....
Территория маленькая, тут был отзыв, что люди 4 дня ходили по отелю, это очень странно. Нет там такого.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Приехали в этот отель из-за природной красоты, шикарных номеров. Но когда начали обследовать отель, то были в шоке! Он очень большой, расположен на горе в джунглях, прямо с отеля можно по ступеням спуститься к горной реки, где есть водопад. Прошлись посмотрели все виллы, это шедевры, по своему обустроены и украшены, везде стоять красивые вазы, горшки и другая утварь, это прямо музей, а потом нашли картинную галерею, это просто восторг. Мы были 4 ночи и каждый день была экскурсия по отелю у нас и мы ещё не все посмотрели. Природа просто божественная, пальмы, лианы и с высоты медитационный площадки ты погружается всем сердцем в матушку природу. Здесь можно точно обрести внутренний покой. Мы просмотрели все номера и они по своему индивидуальны и необычны! Я бы в каждом пожила! Очень все круто сделано, везде чисто, 2 бассейна, ресторан, кафе на втором этаже, где тоже музей. Шик, блеск, красота!
Номер шикарный, кровать удобная, подушки удобные, кондиционер работает на ура, ванная шикарная, все из натуральных материалов, мебель из дерева, это настоящий индонезийский стиль, не путайте с ДСП и Леруа Мерлен!!! Есть чайник, кофе, чай.
Вайфай! Он везде! Абсолютно везде у вас будет ловить вайфай! Я такого ни где не встречала.
Персонал очень милый и рад вас видеть, причем вас называют по имени!
Ресторан утром предлагает комплекс завтраков на выбор из 5 позиций. Все вкусно.
Поесть можно как в отеле, так если выйти из отеля направо будет ресторан, пройтись минут 7, если налево, то за углом будет варунг, все вкусно - суп, курица и рис, макороны и курица. Здесь выбор по питанию не большой в этом районе.
Такси лучше вызывать заранее, часа за 2, так как в Убуде пробки и такси может ехать очень долго если через приложение Граб. Но и сотрудники могут вам вызвать такси.
Деньги меняйте заранее, обменников нет. Отель принимает карты Газпром Юнион Пэй.
Купили у них очень вкусный мед земляных пчел, советую, расплатились по карте. 1 бутылка 300к.

reviewTitle: Great to enjoy the jungle not too far from Ubud and Tegalalang

reviewTextParts.Liked: Great remote location in the middle of rice fields and jungles. The resort is very green and spread out over quite a large area. The pool is lovely with a fantastic view.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Rooms are located in a rather new ugly building with terrible acoustics! You can hear tv from rooms above and around you. Our first night we were woken up at 4am and then again at 5 by other people checking in and rattling with luggage, door handles, etc. Bathroom did not have any window or fan and you could smell the toilet pipes when showering for some reason. The aesthetics of the room left much to be desired especially given the beauty of both traditional and modern Balinese furniture everywhere else.

reviewTextParts.Liked: the concept
reviewTextParts.Disliked: too far

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location is very good if you want to roam around Ubud. Its beautiful and the staff is lovely. There is a waterfall in the resort which is very good. Food was amazing. Pools were good.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Bed could be bit more comfortable. But manageable for short stays

reviewTextParts.Liked: the swimming pool and the monkeys :)
reviewTextParts.Disliked: the breakfast was really dissatisfying, not so many choices

reviewTextParts.Liked: Beautiful and picturesque, great views from room.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The staff did not allow us to look after our own room key and we were required to return it each time we left the building. They reported it was due to having to pay $150 aud to replace the lock should we loose the key… which we tried to say that we would pay should be loose it as we would rather keep the key for peace of mind as we felt uncomfortable. At the end of the day, they did not allow us to keep the key with us. We had specifically asked for our room to not be cleaned and this request was not granted. The air conditioner in the room was poor and did not make a significant difference in temperature. Staff were friendly however, we felt as thought we were being watched each time we left the room in an eerie way. There was only one other guest staying in the resort during our stay and the resort felt abandoned and uncomfortable for two young girls. It was extremely difficult to get Gojeks from the hotel to get into town, so we hired our own scooter which ended up being the best option for the 15-20min ride into Ubud. The television was unable to connect to any decent Chanel’s.

reviewTitle: Unforgettable experience and people, go for one of the villas!

reviewTextParts.Liked: I stayed in the ‘panoramic view villa’ or Bali Villa 1, with my family. They accommodated the youngest child (14 y/o) free of charge - with breakfast and and extra bed!!
reviewTextParts.Disliked: While it is true that some facilities are not fully updated, such as limited charging ports, what Tanah Merah lacks in the shiniest fittings it more than makes up for in its authentic Balinese charm and excellent customer service. In my opinion, if you want to truly experience Bali and still live in comfort and style, you are better off at Tanah Merah, than some clandestine hotel with its cookie cutter design. For one, the view is sublime and the location is right above petanu river and a beautiful waterfall you have direct access to. It is also a short drive from centre city ubud while still being a  private retreat. Secondly, the furnishings and design of the villa has been done with a keen eye for detail. We spent long nights in the open air area on a raised wooden platform with traditional seating, overlooking the rainforest. I can of course only speak of the villa we stayed in and the villas next to us. Breakfast perfectly suited our needs with a range of options to choose from, the staff were very friendly and accommodating to our vegetarian dietary needs. After breakfast in the morning we could find the owner Dr Peter in the lounging in the lobby, definitely take the opportunity to chat with him about the history of the resort- he built it himself and you can tell the effort and care he still puts in it based on the excellent management of the resort.

propertyResponse:

We've made every effort to create an environment that balances comfort, style and true taste of Bali, so it's heartening to hear that these aspect stood out for you. Our team takes immense pride in small details whether it's the design of the villa or the preparation for the breakfast, and we're pleased these efforts contributed to a memorable stay. We also thank you for mentioning your encounters with Dr. Peter, the owner of the resort. He's always keen on sharing the history of the resort with our guests. In reference to your feedback about the charging ports. we are considering the update. Your feedback is invaluable to us for improving our surroundings and service. Once again, thank you for taking the time to share your review regarding your recent stay with us. We hope to welcome you and your family back to Tanah Merah Art Resort for more unforgettable experiences. 
Best regards,

Starting from the checkin:
1) I arrived in the night as my flight with the evening there was only one guy at the property.(Security problem, plus nobody to help with the luggage) i had to carry(no trolley ofcourse!) myself 4 bags to the room and through the stairs to reach the so called villa.
2) poor illumination all around. my daughter tripped three times un even stairs!!.
3) No room service!!. i called the number put in their menu it was ringing with no one is picking the phone. i  called the reception and they gave me another number. they said we do not do room service because we are out of staff. thats not a kind of answer to receive form so called 5 star hotel.
4) the room condition-villa it was very poorly maintained. doors not closing properly the mesch installed aroud the opening is rusted and broken i have to close the opening by plastic bag myself.... the water pressure is very poor, all the windows do not close properly another security problem.
5) the breakfast was very poor it is similar to the quality of a hostage. one egg one coffee and old danish not even heated. coffee mostly water and no choices!!.
6) the pool is also poorly maintained during the stay i have never seen a pool guy cleaning the pool or spraying chlorine on it. again its health hazard.
7) whenever i am asking for taxi they are taking advatage of the tourist and charging more. infront of me the family was dropped from the airport and i wanted to go to ubud center they charged 80k IDR while it costs max of 50k IDR.
thats not professionalism from so called 5 star hotel.
i checked out earlier than expected as i couldnot stay in such property. when i asked to refund for last niht they refused as they say its not refundable.
as a respectable company Booking.com people use a

reviewTextParts.Liked: Doğanın içinde olmasını çok sevdik. Çalışanlar güzel yüzlüydü.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Bi tık uzaktı. Ve kaldığımız yer asla temiz değildi ve temizlemiyorlardı,düzenleyip gidiyorlardı. Fiyatıda aldığımız hizmete göre pahalıydı.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Las instalaciones y la ubicación es muy buena, el problema principal es q no están insonorizadas las habitaciones (las ventanas son de madera y hay bastante hueco en ellas), el último día a las 3 de la madrugada nos despertó un tuckay ( hasta el día siguiente no supe lo q era peor hace mucho ruido para lo pequeño que es) y desde las 6 hasta las 8 q decidimos levantarnos de la cama parecía que estábamos dentro de un gallinero, por otra parte entra mucha luz a la habitación aunq pongas la cortina, y hay una cristalera encima de la puerta que hace q entre la luz del pasillo de noche. Por otra parte la limpieza parecía perfecta cuando entramos pero nada más lejos de la realidad, había unos tapices simulando arte que acumulaban polvo desde hace décadas y la mosquitera de la cama también estaba tiempo sin limpiarse por lo que no ha sido nada agradable para alguien como yo que sufre de alergia. Pese a todo no nos fuimos con mal sabor de boca porque el personal del hotel era muy atento y las instalaciones en general estaban muy bien. La bañera era de decoración, no tenía grifo.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: La falta de insonorización y limpieza en la habitación

reviewTextParts.Liked: Rien
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Tout
C’est vieille salle moche moche moche
Horrible je ne comprends pas les 5 étoiles

reviewTextParts.Liked: O locatie superba cu multe piese de arta locală, liniștita și o priveliște de vis…

Freundliches Personal
grosse Anlage im grünen mit zwei Pools
riesengrosses Zimmer
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Es hat im Bad ein bisschen muffig gerochen was man auch im Zimmer gemerkt hat
Eine kleine Renovation ist langsam fällig. (Restaurant hat zum Teil Plastikstühle und Besteck zwischen den schönen Möbeln)

reviewTextParts.Liked: La vue panoramique est en effet magnifique, et le personnel nous a changé de chambre quand on leur a demandé.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Disons que les photos sont vraiment trompeuses... l'hôtel est vieillissant, propre mais vieillot. Soit les photos ont été prises il y a 10 ans, soit ils savent très bien se servir de photoshop. La literie mauvaise. Nous avons écourté notre séjour, 1 nuit au lieu des 3 prévues, car la nuit on a été fortement dérangés par le bruit (villa pas du tout isolée, ça a son charme mais pas quand on a le sommeil léger).
Ça aurait pu passer avec un tarif inférieur, mais en comparaison avec ce qu'on avait trouvé à Bali avant, ce fut une déception. 100€ la nuit ça se mérite...

reviewTextParts.Liked: Le personnel était très sympa et la piscine vaut le détour.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Les équipements des chambres sont un peu vétustes et l’hôtel est très bruyant (chambres mal insonorisées)

reviewTextParts.Liked: La végétation,la piscine,l'emplacement. Facilité pour louer un scooter. La breakfast box le jour du départ. Le chauffeur qui nous attend à l'aéroport. Eau à volonté.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: La chambre dans le bâtiment principal, aucun charme, aucune décoration typique,murs jaune safran très agressifs . Petit déjeuner à la carte. Un buffet serait plus agréable..

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Ruhige Lage
Mit der Natur verbunden mit Blick auf den Dschungel
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Sehr in die Jahre gekommen. Nicht sehr sauber (Spinnenweben im Apartment, Ameisenplage, Verdreckter Lichtschalter, Tote Insekten am Dach des Bettes)
Im Restaurant sind Plastikstühle zwischen schönen Holzsessel und die Marmelade steht in einem Plastikbecher am Tisch. Salz und Pfeffer ebenso aus einem giftgrünen Plastikbehälter. Das Personal ist im Restaurant unfreundlich und geht nicht auf spezielle Wünsche ein. Auf keinen Fall 5 Sterne Resort

reviewTextParts.Liked: Все поправилось! Отличные пейзажи, очень вкусная кухня, полный релакс
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Брали 2 виллы, в одной из них кровать просто разваливалась (страшно скрипела), но общих впечатлений это не испортило )

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Ruhige Lage, sehr nettes Personal, kommen gerne wieder. Außergewöhnliche Sammlung, gleicht einem Museum :) da können andere Museen noch lernen.
Essen war auch gut - Preis ist fair.

reviewTitle: Best Hotel you can get on tampak siring

reviewTextParts.Liked: Kamarnya luas bersih. Restonya rekomended. Masakannya enak-enak suwer gk bohong. Bagus buat acara ato buat keluarga, makan dekat jadi ngga perlu keluar lagi. Paket lengkap pokoknya.
Fantastisk smuk placering med udsigt over junglen og uden for Ubuds kaos.
Les piscines
reviewTextParts.Disliked: L’aimbilité du personel, trop de bruit dans les couloirs, chambres vétustes, robinetterie cassées

reviewTextParts.Liked: Personel dışında herşey vasattı. Çok yardımcı oldular. Özellikle gececi resepsiyonist arkadaş. Teşekkürler. Motor kiralamanız şart. Şehir dışında bi otel bilerek gitmeniz tavsiye edilir. Havaalanından 1,5-2 saat uzaklıkta. Ve bu otelde kalıyorsanız her sabah 8de uyandırma servisi gibi oda temizlik görevlileri koridorda yüksek sesle konuşarak çalışıyorlar.

reviewTitle: Es war der beste Urlaub egal ob für Pärchen oder Familie

reviewTextParts.Liked: Der Ausblick+Personal

reviewTitle: Le classement de cinq étoile à réviser, je lui donne plutôt 2

reviewTextParts.Liked: Rien, extrêmement déçu.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Ça ne correspond en rien aux photos et à la description qui m'ont été présentées. Je trouve que cela ne mérite pas cinq étoiles.
Les toilettes étaient extrêmement sales et dans un état de vétusté avancé. La propreté loin d'être à la hauteur de mes attentes, et cela a grandement impacté mon confort. De plus, le lit dans ma chambre n’était pas du tout confortable. Non seulement il s’agissait de deux lits simples collés ensemble, mais en plus ils glissait constamment, ce qui a rendu mon sommeil très perturbé.
Sans parler de piscine bouffe et prix sur la carte en dollars… aussi l’emplacement pas du tt accessible loin du centre et meme les taxi acceptait difficilement la course.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Ubicacion tranquila, no muy lejos del centro.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Restaurante terrible, desayuno terrible. Definitivamente no es lo que te esperas.

reviewTextParts.Liked: El personal es amable.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
La ubicación es retirada desde el centro de Ubud.
La limpieza no es pulcra, el baño siempre olía mal desde el día que llegamos.
Tuve que llamar para poder solucionar el tema del agua caliente aparte de la poca presión de agua.
Las puertas corredizas no brindan privacidad del todo, la ventana hacia el balcón tampoco cerraba.
El desayuno incluido es básico, si deseas algo de la carta debes agregar un 21% de recargo (impuestos+ cargo por servicio) aparte de tener precios sobre lo que puedas encontrar en Ubud.
En general el hotel es antiguo.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Struttura con panorama mozzafiato, personale eccellente, ristorante interno alla struttura molto comodo e di qualità buona
reviewTextParts.Disliked: wifi lento alle volte assente, regolazione acqua calda in bagno difficoltosa, pulizia acqua piscina non eccezionale, l’edificio dove era situata la nostra stanza era un po’ fuori contesto rispetto all’architettura del resto della struttura

reviewTextParts.Liked: Ruhige Lage, viel Kunst und liebevolle Details.Freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal.

reviewTitle: Nicht das wert was es sein sollte

reviewTextParts.Liked: Die Freundlichkeit der Menschen
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Von einer Luxusvilla kann keine Rede sein. Die Austattung der Villa läßt zu wünschen übrig. Lose Toilettendeckel und schmutzige Toilette. Waschbeckeneinlauf verostet bzw. vergammelt. Armaturen Lose am Waschbecken. Armaturen überhaupt nicht gepflegt. Rund um keine 5 Sterne wert. Es gibt bessere und günstigere Unterkünfte bei weniger Sternen. Restaurant erfüllt auch keinen 5 Sterne Standard, keine Cocktails, Bier aus der Dose Gläser aus Plastik usw. Alles lieblos.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Мне понравилось  абсолютно  всё. Это место маленький  рай.Огромное спасибо всему персоналу за их прекрасный сервис. Особенное спасибо хозяину этого resort  доктор Peter.
Это  необыкновенный  человек с огромным сердем. Это человек  легенда который создал необычный  музей в этом resort. Это шедевр .Такого я не видела ещё  нигде.
Обязательно  вернусь  ещё

reviewTitle: Was a great hotel and fantastic location in the centre of the jungle.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Stunning grounds and lovely staff.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: N/A

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location is good. The staff is so helpful and smile. Endless pool is amazing!
The location
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
The room was dirty
Eggs (insect) on and next to the bed
The bedding was dirty and damp
The mattress had mildew on it
The food was disappointing
You had to leave your keys with them when you left the property
That’s why we left after our first night and didn’t stay the full 3. Would not recommend this place at all

reviewTextParts.Liked: I liked the big room and comfy bed. I walked down to the river which was a workout
reviewTextParts.Disliked: That it was advertised as heated pool. The bath looked lovely however it didn't work. The sky garden was shut as no staff althoogh there was plenty in the kitchen

reviewTextParts.Liked: What was portrayed on the website
reviewTextParts.Disliked: False advertising. Promoted as having 2 restaurants (one with view over ravine) and sky bar (with magnificent view. Only one restaurant open and no lovely view. This was peak season and resort apparently booked out. Art collection not freely available to view. Need to book tour and not avail every day. Our breakfast was inedible. 2 pools, one teeny and the other sample but both have no shade and no umbrellas. I could go on with more suffice to say they need to lift their game. I’m a frequent Bali visitor. I do not recommend this place.

reviewTitle: Nice rooms but the hotel itself needs more ‘love’ and the restaurant is very expensive.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The room itself was beautiful and the beds are really comfortable. The staff are really polite and accommodating.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Many of the amenities weren’t open, even though they are mentioned in their welcome leaflet and booking confirmation. It would’ve been nice if the bars were open as there wasn’t much of an atmosphere around the place. We felt the hotel needed a freshen up as it felt abit unloved. The restaurant on-site was extremely expensive for the quality of food (two chicken subs, two beers and two juices for around $50. This was one of our most expensive meals the whole trip!!!).

reviewTextParts.Liked: It was so beautiful. The view of the jungle from my villa was superb. I definitely recommend booking a villa over a room as they didn’t seem nearly as nice. The staff were so helpful and friendly and not just out for your money like in some places I stayed. I absolutely adored the place and wish I’d been there longer. Definitely order the steak if go. It’s the best ever!
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Nothing at all. It is a bit far out of town. But that’s what made it nice. Just stock up on drinks and snacks on your way. As there aren’t many shops nearby. My taxi driver was happy to stop at a supermarket on way.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Studio room really generous size, pool beautiful, view beautiful, staff very welcoming, easy access to Ubud
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Hotel is a little 'tired' and lots of small things that could be done just that little bit better took the 'gloss' off our stay when compared to other Balinese hotels & villas. Like no drinking water in the rooms or asking for an extra piece of toast at breakfast and being told 'not sure that is possible'. Really simple things but just felt hotel wanted to charge for everything. 1 restaurant & rooftop bar not ope during our stay in high season. Nice place but to be honest can do better for the money

reviewTextParts.Liked: The pool area was nice.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: This place is super old and creepy. The building is full of moist and mold. The rooms are very dirty and not clean. Stay away from this place, it's been a real bad experience overall.

reviewTitle: A true gem close to Ubud

reviewTextParts.Liked: Beautiful location, friendly staff, very clean rooms. Just pure Balinese hospitality.

reviewTitle: Nice resort with lots of history.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Location and the view
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The hygiene can be improved.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The property and location was amazing. Good substantial breakfast with options, friendly staff and the owner provided a personal touch by sharing stories of his journey. We spent a whole day just exploring and enjoying the property and it's surroundings.

reviewTitle: An amazing stay in an incredible place!

reviewTextParts.Liked: the location, the staff, the facilities.. everything!
reviewTextParts.Disliked: nothing at all!

reviewTitle: Be careful when booking villa with garden view. This is what we got. Feeling disappointed and cheated.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Fantastic pool and the view. If you get the real villa with garden view then you are happy.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: We got cheated by the hotel. We booked two villas with garden view. Instead we got one villa and one simple apartment with an iron door and a view of a back of hotel. It was not even a nice forest view. Attaching few pics so that other customers know what they can possibly get when booking a villa. The hotel says they have two interior pictures added to the villa gallery so everything is fair. But they have not showed the outside because nobody would ever choose this for villa with garden view.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The Resort is amazing and we enjoyed our stay there. But you will only enjoy it if you like the history. The Resort is a living museum with art. We felt like we were living inside an art museum.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The resort needs a little bit of maintenance. The food was okay in some dishes and amazing in others.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Very comfortable
Better in reality
Good location, great view and a waterfall and river nearby. The hotel and the room were well decorated with pieces of art. The hotel staff were helpful. The view in the infinity pool was amazing.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The breakfast was not that good and can be improved

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Friendly staff
The Balinese environment
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
US price so more than you expect on change
To far away from anything $10 taxi to ubud
Over 2hrs from airport
No restaurants close so had to eat their or go to ubud.Cost

reviewTitle: The staff where great , but the place is tired

reviewTextParts.Liked: Not a lot
reviewTextParts.Disliked: It’s old and in need of maintenance , paint peeling , a bath without any taps , the art it’s suppose to be about was mostly locked rooms you couldn’t go into , the free breakfast was , well you would not pay for it

reviewTitle: If you want a peaceful and quiet place to stay this is it

reviewTextParts.Liked: Awesome location and beautiful gardens .so peaceful and quiet .it was like we were the only people there and the river and jungle views are epic .close to lots of attractions as well
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Lots of stairs to negotiate if you are on the lower levels but not a deal breaker

reviewTitle: wie waren sehr glücklich mit dem Hotel, allerdings war das Frühstück nicht gut.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Wie waren sehr zufrieden mit unserem Aufenthalt dort. Das Personal ist super freundlich und war immer sehr zuvorkommend. Die Lage des Hotels ist super, wenn man die Natur liebt. Man ist mitten im Dschungel. Direkt am Hotel anliegend ist ein wunderschöner Wasserfall und Fluss, in dem man bei Gelegenheit auch schwimmen kann. Die Anlage des Hotels ist schön gestaltet, wie auch sie Zimmer.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Wir hatten das Frühstück inklusive, jedoch hat uns das nicht gefallen. Das Frühstück wählst du a la carte aus. Auswahl ist sehr klein und die Portionen ebenfalls.

reviewTitle: Sentirsi felici in un paesaggio magico e rasserenante

reviewTextParts.Liked:
L'atmosfera fatta di pace, natura rigogliosa e sorrisi della gente. Personale squisito, disponibilità a mille. Mi hanno pure preparato cena per le dieci sera: una buonissima pizza con pomodorini e basilico freschi. Ottima cuoca locale.
Splendida "villa"(casa tipica balinese) con  terrazza con vista sulla foresta nella vallata e scimmiette all'orizzonte che penzolavano di ramo in ramo.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Forse il fatto che faceva scintille la presa di corrente in stanza e quindi ho preferito ricaricare il cellulare con la mia Power bank. Il bagno al pianterreno e la stanza da letto sopra, con scaletta ripida, può essere un problema per alcuni (ma non lo è stato per me, stavolta).

reviewTitle: om te ontspannen en geen digitale interactie de juiste plek

reviewTextParts.Liked:
het is erg mooi en het uitzicht adembenemend.
als je wilt ontspannen is het heel fijn hier.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: om naar het centrum te gaan moet je toch een tijdje rijden, eten is niet dichtbij en wifi ligt er regelmatig uit, ondanks een locale simkaart was de ontvangst niet goed vanwege de ligging.

reviewTextParts.Liked: De art collectie op het ressort was indrukwekkend en boven verwachting! Een echte aanrader!
reviewTextParts.Disliked: WiFi

reviewTitle: genel olarak dogayla iç içe sessiz sakin tam kafa dinlemelik güzel biryer dekorasyon ve dizyanı cok iyiydi fiyat olarak

reviewTextParts.Liked: manzarası kahvaltı çalısanları çok güler yüzlü ve ilgiliydi kafa dinlemek isteyenler için güzel biryer

reviewTitle: Wunderschöne Hotelanlage mit sehr schöner Lage!

reviewTextParts.Liked: Das Personal ist hervorranged und erfüllt alle Wünsche die man hat. Super Roomservice und Betreuung. Die Hotelanlage ist sehr gepflegt. Es liegt mitten im Dschungel und sieht fantastisch aus. Das Frühstück ist sehr gut.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Es gab einen Stromausfall wegen eines Sturm aber es wurde innerhalb von einer Stunde alles gelöst! Die Hotelanlage ist sehr gross und man verirrt sich leicht.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Le cadre est magnifique, vous avez une vue sur la forêt incroyable et vous êtes ds un calme parfait.  À 8/10 min d'Ubud en voiture. Le personnel de l'hôtel est très aimable et la gallerie d'art est impressionnante.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: La nourriture, le petit déjeuner était assez pauvre et si vous y mangez le soir, les prix sont assez exorbitants pour la qualité servie dans les assiettes. Le menu est en USD avec des plats avoisinants les 10/15 USD ce qui peut paraître peu mais pour le même prix vous pouvez avoir bien mieux dans le centre d'Ubud.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Lage und Ausblick sind wirklich sehr schön.
Kleiner Wasserfall direkt nebenan.
Vom Gelände gab es einen tollen Blick in den Dschungel.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Das Zimmer war ganz anders als beschrieben und war nicht schön. Es wurden Poolblick, Gartenblick Innenhof, Flussblick, Veranda, Balkon, Schallisolierung usw. angegeben und wir hatten zwar ein Zimmer mit einer sehr großen Fensterfront erhalten, allerdings mit Blick Richtung Hintergärten der Dorfhäuser. Schallisolierung ist nicht vorhanden. Den ganzen Tag durchgehend krähen dort die Hähne aus der Nachbarschaft. Die versprochene Aussicht hatte man nur wenn man nicht im Zimmer war. Balkon, Veranda usw. waren ebenfalls nicht vorhanden. Das Bad war nicht sauber. Es gab verschiedene Dinge aus der Menükarte nicht: einige Desserts nicht und Cocktails gar nicht.
Die Skybar ist nicht mehr vorhanden.
Hier überzeugt eigentlich vor allem die Lage und alles andere eher nicht so.
Aufgrund der Beschreibung hatte man einfach mehr erwartet, als letztlich geboten wurde. Hier sollten die Zimmerbeschreibungen angepasst werden.

reviewTextParts.Liked: ruim opgezet, hele grote kamer, fantastische ligging. Vriendelijk personeel
reviewTextParts.Disliked: het ligt toch wat ver van Ubud centrum vandaan. voordat de taxi er is en weer terug, dat kan soms even duren.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Le paysage au petit déjeuner et au bord de la piscine.
Il faut faire attention en réservant,  il y a des catégories très différentes.
Nous pensions avoir un bungalow mais c'était un
grande chambre. Moins de charme, mais confortable.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: La nourriture au restaurant, trop limitée en choix et souvent chère malgré sa simplicité.

reviewTitle: Za tu cenu se dá určo v ubudu najit lepši ubytko

reviewTextParts.Liked: Bazén s přepadem
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Druhý bazén za bazénem s přepadem! Zelená bažina! A za tu cenu v bazéně večer nesvítí světlo je to dost škoda. Škoda že ubytovaní není i lepe popsané že je to skoro panelák.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Das Personal war sehr hilfsbereit und die Zimmer sehr schön. Der Ausblick war mega, direkt auf den Dschungel.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
Schlimmste Massage ever. Die Masseuse hat während auf dem Handy geschrieben und ihr Handy hat ständig zwischen meinen Füßen vibriert. Außerdem keine Musik. Dafür sehr teuer im Vergleich zu besseren Massagen in ubud( 180k).
Das Frühstück ist ok, kenne ich aus ubud aber auch besser.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
La tranquilidad del lugar y la vista hermosa que tenía.
Es un lugar para ir a descansar y hacer una pausa en el viaje.
Al estar más retirado del centro tenía un restaurante que ofrecía todas las comidas.
reviewTextParts.Disliked:

Tuvimos un problema con la limpieza del baño ( fue solucionado)

Im Vorfeld habe ich versucht das Zimmer in  ein Cottage  umzzubuchen. Erst wurde mir ein Angebot gemacht, 3 Stunden später war eine Umbuchung nicht mehr möglich.  Ich bin eher abgereist, da ich eine bessere Unterkunft gefunden  hatte.

reviewTitle: Envolvente de natureza incrível e staff super friendly mas hotel 5* que não deveria ser!

reviewTextParts.Liked: O espaço é incrível, a sua envolvente é Maravilhosa! Todo o Hotel está envolvido na mágiaca Bali nature :)O Staff super friendly, incansáveis, SUPER atenciosos, simpáticos e prestáveis. A verdadeira imagem das pessoas de Bali.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: O Hotel 5* não faz juz à sua classificação. As comodidades são antigas e sem manutenção.Cheiro a mofo, a casa de banho nada adaptada e suja. Com adaptada quero dizer que ergonomicamente nada adaptada ao comum mortal, banheira tinha 1m de altura, para entrar necessitava de suporte, sem antiderrapante nem proteçao, gastada. Prece um hotel relicário mas sem manutenção, não vale o dinehiro que se paga, nem sequer deveria ser 5*!

reviewTextParts.Liked: Meraviglioso

Espectacular hotel con perfecta conexión con la naturaleza.
La energía de Tanah Merah es indescriptible.
Desconexión con lo exterior para reconexión con lo importante, tu interior...
Belleza en estado puro en casa rincón.
Tanah Merah hotel es una obra de arte en sí mismo. Su emplazamiento en medio de un vergel, su cuidada minuciosamente estructura de plantas, ebullición de flores, aromas, texturas...
El personal es excepcional!!!
Peter, el regente, es un generoso visionario con actitud de grandeza en todo lo que ha creado, desde la construcción de todo el complejo, su decoración y su exquisito trato al cliente y a su equipo. Gracias por tanto, Peter!!
El gerente, Ngurah, siempre disponible creando magia en cada detalle, haciendo fácil cualquier contratiempo.
La comida es exquisita, servida en unos comedores que parecen sacados de las Mil y Una Noches.
Las habitaciones son como ubicaciones de cuentos de Princesas, impresionantes!!
El baño en la Infinity pool con vistas a la selva y divisando la puesta de sol es indescriptible...
Y los masajes balineses... Simplemente te llevan a otra dimensión.
Espectacular!!!!
Ya pensando en volver!! GRACIAS, GRACIAS, GRACIAS!!!

reviewTextParts.Liked: Un hotel con encanto. Una arquitectura preciosa en el medio de la selva. Tiene una cascada cerca y dos piscinas,  de la cual, la infinity que da a la selva siempre estaba vacía y se podía ver como el sol se ocultaba detrás de los árboles.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: La comida no era buena. La calidad mala y el precio alto. Eché de menos los desayunos típicos de Bali. Sólo había incluido desayuno americano o continental. Muy para turistas.
Dyrt hotel i forhold til hvilke faciliteter der var brugbare. Mange ting lukkede og ekstrem dyre priser for deres mad og drikkevarer. Maden var til og med ikke særlig god

reviewTextParts.Liked: Very comfortable and hospitable staff. The food was good and the facilities were clean!
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Nothing

reviewTitle: Excellent place to visit. Need 1 full day to explore inside the resort.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Ambience, service, location

We LOVED our stay at Tanah Merah. The pool is stunning, our room was lovely, everywhere is well maintained and clean. The staff are so polite and helpful. It's a little further from Ubud than we realised but that was actually a good thing, it's tucked away from all of the chaos and noise. You can fall asleep to the sounds of the jungle. Incredible. We would highly recommend staying here!!
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Nothing, it was perfect.

reviewTitle: SIMPLY ASTONISHING ....PARADISE AWAY FROM UBUD CIRCUS

reviewTextParts.Liked: Exceptional wonderful friendly staff. NGURAH is a gem! Maybe you will be lucky enough for him to greet you. Hotel is the amalgamation of a lovely Danish man's life work, collecting art and creating a very special location close to Ubud but far from the madding crowds. The views from the infinity pools are Four Seasons Standard.....simply astonishing. The rooms are cavernous and the bathtub made me feel like a prince. Can't fault this extraordinary resort!
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Absolutely nothing to complain about.

reviewTitle: It was okay— not worth the price.

reviewTextParts.Liked:
The property was alright. The staff was the best part about the property. The property manager was very helpful and everyone else was very pleasant. Despite only eating at the restaurant at the hotel and drinking the water from the hotel, my mom still got ‘Bali Belly’ and the property manager was very responsive and arranged to have a doctor come to the hotel within an hour.
The owner has a gallery of his artifacts that he’s collected over the years and it’s quite impressive. The location is quite far from everything. A lot of tour groups that offer pickup from Ubud would not pick up from the hotel and if they did, they would for an extra fee. The hotel offered their own tours but it was considerably more expensive.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: There are 2 restaurants at the property; however, due to the pandemic, they only operate one but have both menus available. The one menu is charged in USD, and is quite expensive. In addition to the expensive prices, there’s a 21% tax and service charge added. We required laundry services during our stay and despite the fees being advertised in rupiah, we were charged in USD, the conversion at the time of check out was not equivalent to the rupiah advertised. The showers have no water pressure at all. The wifi is very slow. There was also no complimentary shuttle to Ubud centre available (despite the hotel advertising that it has this service).

reviewTextParts.Liked: A fantastic treasure in the most wonderful location. Outstanding customer care and service.
the food and the staff in the sky bar
reviewTextParts.Disliked: layout, garish yellow paint, pools were not clean

reviewTextParts.Liked: simple food , not too bad.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: they gave me the wrong room which is much cheaper than I booked , and refused to compensate the room rate difference.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Every meal was wonderful, menu includes traditional Indonesian food as well as Western options.The entire resort is extremely clean and well maintained. There are have 2 pools, and a private track down to two waterfalls!There's an enormous art gallery on site.Rooftop bar with views of jungle, rice paddies and volcanoes! There's even a driver to take you into Ubud whenever you'd likeThe staff is a collection of the nicest people in Bali

reviewTitle: amazing, unique experience which we will remember forever.

reviewTextParts.Liked: unique one-of a kind resort with excellent view, great staff and an amazing art museum. the host was just superb with such a vast knowledge of Bali to share.

reviewTextParts.Disliked: Nur Kleine Frühstücksauswahl, keine Balkon

reviewTextParts.Liked: Het hotel zit iets verder van centrum Ubud af waardoor het lekker rustig is. Centrum is met scooter of taxi prima te bereiken. De service is top, kamer was groot en schoon, medewerkers waren ontzettend aardig en behulpzaam, goed restaurant.
Era precioso, habitación grandísima y el lugar idílico
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Lejos del centro sin ninguna conexión.

reviewTitle: Hotel splendide mais prestations annexes horriblement chères

reviewTextParts.Liked: Magnifique endroit, la petite piscine est vraiment superbe. Petit dej très très bien,le mieux qu on ait eu à Bali.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Le prix de tout ce qu ils proposent est 2 fous plus cher que partout dans Ubud !! Scooter 2 fois plus cher, massage aussi,et le pire le taxi! Ils te proposent 900k pour un trajet qu on a payé 500k!! Résumé, très bon hôtel tant qu on prend aucune activités par eux.

reviewTitle: El personal  como todos los de la zona muy gentiles amables , con la mejor actitud pero para el costo puedes pagar algo

reviewTextParts.Liked: Tiene una hermosa vista hacia las montañas , poca variedad en sus cocina
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Terribles las camas por los colchones están manchados , sucios , chorreados , las camas no tienen mantenimiento

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Sehr freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal
Wäscheservice
Fijne mensen en prachtige locatie. Ontbijt was heerlijk en uitgebreid.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Restaurant was wel redelijk duur. Hebben vooral buitenshuis gegeten.

reviewTextParts.Disliked: Gewöhnungsbedürftige Türrahmen aus Eisen mit Glasfüllung

reviewTitle: Sembra di soggiornare in tempio, meraviglioso.

reviewTextParts.Liked: L'Hotel sembra un tempio, molto bello con piscine, Location strepitosa, la Camera Deluxe è veramente grande 60 mq con due letti matrimoniali allestita con diverse opere d'arte anche acquistabili
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Il tempo per arrivare a Ubud è lungo per via delle strade molto strette e del traffico.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Alt var godt

reviewTitle: Veel van de omgeving gezien, erg vriendelijk personeel en een erg fijne sfeer op het resort

reviewTextParts.Liked: Erg vriendelijk personeel, niets was teveel gevraagd. Massage gehad bij de spa, was erg fijn. Personeel in beide restaurants was erg vriendelijk en sprak goed engels. Kamer was ruim en hotel had een mooie uitstraling met veel kunst. Ontbijt was prima met uitzicht de vallei in (+waterval). Konden voor 80k per dag een prima scooter huren waarmee we in 15 minuten in het centrum van ubud/ monkeyforest waren.

reviewTitle: Verblijf opzicht prima, maar hotel valt een beetje tegen

reviewTextParts.Liked: Zeker vriendelijke personeels
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Locatie en faciliteiten

reviewTextParts.Liked: Прекрасное место, интереснейший музей !

reviewTitle: Nach Corona gibt es noch viel zu tun…

reviewTextParts.Disliked: Das Resort entspricht nicht der angegebenen Sterne. Es befindet sich in einem Teils renovationsbedürftigem Zustand. Zimmer ohne aussich! Wurde nicht als solches beschrieben oder Photografisch festgehalten. Badezimmer schmuddelig, Pool trüb und dunkelgrün.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Die Lage ist gut und die Zinner sind groß.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Die ganze Anlage ist sehr alt und wirkt ao als währe lange niemand mehr da gewesen. In unserem Bad hat es von der Decke getropft und es war alles sehr dreckig. Außerdem ist das Essen viel zu Überteuert. Mein Tipp sucht euch was anderes die ganze Anlage hat gefühlt keine gute Aura auch wenn das etwas bescheuert klingt.

reviewTitle: Sublime hotel - vivre dans une poésie !

reviewTextParts.Liked: Positif: l’hotel porte bien son nom on a l impression de séjourner dans un musée dans le sens positif du terme. L’hôtel est tres authentique et a un charme fou. Le jardin de la piscine est magnifique. Le personnel est tres agréable la nourriture est bonne et pas chère. Je vous recommande vraiment cet établissement j y retournerai si je peux.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Négatif: la literie est dure dans les cabanes et pour les lits jumeaux (je ne peux pas dire pour les lits doubles). Apres une remarque à la réception une solution a été trouvée immédiatement avec l ajout d un surmatelas. Ne prenez pas les cabanes pour une personne âgée à cause des escaliers. Manque de transats à la piscine (mais on comprends le souhait de ne pas endommager le cote authentique avec plein de transats). Les serveurs ne passent pas à la piscine il faut descendre commander au restaurant. Points negatifs derisoires par rapport à la beauté de l hotel!

reviewTextParts.Disliked: A ornamentação

reviewTextParts.Disliked: ho amato tutto, solo il bagno della camera era senza aspirazione

reviewTextParts.Liked: Le calme le decor et les distractions que propose le Resort. La piscine . Le musée . La collection d'objets qui retrace l'historique de Bali

reviewTitle: Не верьте тому, что это 5 звезд отель. Это неправда.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Вид, его испортить у них не получилось!Персонал старался сгладить низкое качество жилья, но это не помогло.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Все остальное! Это не 5-звездочный отель, не понимаю кто им 5 звезд поставил. Нам досталась комната в 3-х этажном здании, которое скорее напоминает больницу. Все коридоры прокурены, лифта нет. За окнами и в коридорах часто шумели, громко кричали и слушали музыку. Персонал за этим не следит. Сама комната просторная, но качество мебели, материалов, сантехники - ужасное. Этому отелю не дам и 2-х звезд! Очень шумно, за стенами слышно как двигают стулья, будто это происходит у вас в комнате. На стенах странные картины. Я конечно не ценитель искусства, но они реально странные и их пришлось снять, чтобы совсем не стало грустно. Несколько раз, пытаясь помыться, обнаруживал отсутствие горячей воды. Невероятно, но кажется они имеют общий котел и его просто не хватает на все комнаты. Тараканы в номере забили последний гвоздь в наше пребывание в этом отеле.Интересно, но персонал зачем то перед заселением повел в номер владельца отеля. Наверное показать как там красиво, но я не понимаю зачем. Потому что потом нас поселили в клоповник, о котором я писал выше. Завтраки! такого скудного завтрака я давно не видел. даже однозвездные отели имели завтрак лучше.Расположение достаточно далеко. Необходимо такси или байк для поездки в Убуд.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Maisemat ihan hyvät.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Uima-allas likainen, vessa likainen. Huoneeseen jätetty tavara varastettiin siivouksen yhteydessä eikä asiaan saanut selvitystä hotellilta.

reviewTextParts.Liked: все супер! два бассейна, большие красивые номера (у нас был семейный с двумя двуспальными кроватями) с закрытой терраской на которой стол со стульями и сушилка для белья. есть ресторанчик, готовят вкусно по  местным меркам 😄  есть художественная галлерея и музей. сам хозяин отеля проводит экскурсии. супер общительный и доброжелательный. персонал хорошо говорит по-английски. готовы помочь с любым вопрос. очень приятная атмосфера. красивые виды на джунгли. прямо из отеля можно спустятся к водопаду, но дорога к нему не самая простая - скользкие ступеньки и ручей, но мы даже с детьми дошли, нормально в принципе.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Le personnel est très gentil, et à l'ecoute. Le resort dispose de nombreux services (massages, location de scooter, un bar et un restaurant, une cascade privée)

propertyResponse:
Dear Thomas, 
Thank you for taking the time for writing us a review. We are delighted to hear that you had a great stay at our resort and that our staff provided excellent service during your visit. We take pride in offering a variety of services such as massages, scooter rental, a bar and restaurant, and access to a private waterfall for our guests to enjoy.

Reservations - Tanah Merah Art Resort

reviewTextParts.Liked:
Wir hatten ein Cottage Timor mit Gartenblick gebucht. Die Sicht auf den Dschungel und Pool war toll. Die Anlage hat allgemein einen wunderschönen Ausblick auf den Dschungel. 2 schöne Pools. Aber das Häuschen war für uns nicht geeignet, alles viel zu dunkel, kaum Tageslicht, elektrisches Licht spartanisch, sehr sehr dunkel und alles in schwarzem Holz, auch die Schränke. Wir sind nach 1 Nacht umgezogen, haben auf Kulanz eine Deluxe Suite zum selben Preis bekommen, war ein 4 Bett Zimmer, riesengroß und hell, grosse Fenster, viel Platz, geräumig und tolles Badezimmer. Totaler Luxus, wir waren sehr zufrieden und glücklich darüber, dass wir umziehen konnten. Es war alles total ruhig und idyllisch, schön angelegt, eigener Wasserfall. Super Wäscheservice. Zimmer immer sehr sauber. Personal sehr freundlich, hilfsbereit und zuvorkommend. In der Nähe, fußläufig ein paar wenige Restaurants/Warungs und Möglichkeiten Getränke zu kaufen. Sonst etwas abgelegen, in der Natur. Nach Ubud Roller notwendig oder anderweitiger Transport.
Weitere Bewertungen beziehen sich auf die Deluxe Suite !
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Frühstück a la cart war sehr bescheiden und sehr wenig. Das Cottage Timor ist für uns nicht das passende gewesen. Hat im Internet nett ausgesehen und war toll beschrieben, entsprach dem jedoch nicht. Sehr klein, sehr sehr dunkel, kaum Tageslicht. Elektrisches Licht sehr dürftig, man sieht kaum was, Taschenlampe war noch notwendig. Im ganzen Häuschen Schwarzes Holz, Schränke schwarzes Holz. Keine Ablagemöglichkeiten, kein Tisch, kein Stuhl (nur draußen auf der Veranda), allgemein alles sehr eng und klein. Kein richtiges Fenster, nur schwarze Holzlucke, direkt ins Freie, überall Spalten, Moskitos usw. dringen ein. Badezimmer durch eine steile Treppe nach unten erreichbar, sehr beschwerlich und nachts auch etwas unpraktisch. Die schwere Holztüre zum Badezimmer knarrt und knirscht sehr laut beim Öffnen und schließen, nachts schreckt der Partner aus dem Schlaf. Wem' s gefällt, okay, aber für uns ist es nichts. Die anderen Zimmer sind in Ordnung und zu empfehlen

propertyResponse:

Thank you for taking the time to provide detailed feedback on your recent stay at our resort. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the beautiful view of the jungle and pools, as well as the overall serene ambiance of our property.

It is wonderful to hear that you found comfort and satisfaction in our deluxe suite with its spacious layout, bright atmosphere, and luxurious amenities. We are pleased that we were able to accommodate your needs promptly.
Your kind words about our staff's friendliness, helpfulness, and attention to cleanliness are truly appreciated. We strive to provide exceptional service to all our guests.
Regarding your feedback on breakfast offerings, we will certainly take this into consideration for future improvements.
Once again, thank you for sharing your experience with us. We hope to welcome you back in the future for another memorable stay at our resort.
Best regards, 
Osin Landek

reviewTextParts.Liked: Pas grand chose hormis la vue
reviewTextParts.Disliked:
j'ai malheureusement été déçu par plusieurs aspects. Tout d'abord, l'accès aux personnes à mobilité réduite ainsi qu'aux enfants en bas âge n'était pas approprié. Les infrastructures ne semblaient pas adaptées pour ces catégories de clients, ce qui a rendu notre séjour inconfortable.
De plus, j'ai été très déçu par le manque d'hygiène de ma chambre. Le nettoyage laissait à désirer, et j'ai été choqué de trouver de nombreuses bestioles telles que des cafards, des araignées et d'autres insectes indésirables dans la chambre. Cela a grandement entaché mon expérience et a rendu mon séjour très désagréable.
Par ailleurs, la piscine de l'hôtel était inutilisable, ce qui a été une véritable déception, surtout pour les enfants. Les parties communes, comme les escaliers et autres zones communes, étaient également difficiles d'accès pour les plus jeunes, ce qui a limité leur liberté de mouvement et de jeu.
Enfin, la qualité de la nourriture au restaurant de l'hôtel était vraiment en deçà de mes attentes. Les plats servis étaient fades et peu appétissants, ce qui a contribué à mon insatisfaction générale vis-à-vis de mon séjour
Dans l'ensemble, mon expérience à cet hôtel a été marquée par ces nombreux points négatifs, ce qui a considérablement affecté mon appréciation globale de l'établissement.

reviewTitle: Perto da natureza -- e da vila de Ubud

reviewTextParts.Liked: O hotel tem diferentes tipos de acomodações. As mais privativas são pequenas casinhas, com disposições distintas, interna e externamente. Ficamos num dos quartos com varanda de um pequeno prédio. Quarto amplo e agradável, aliás. Detalhe: é preciso subir uma escadaria nesse prédio, porque não há elevador. A localização do hotel é realmente incrível, porque está nos arredores da vilinha principal (e agitada de Ubud), no meio da floresta, com direito a duas belas quedas d'água, onde avistamos lindas aves e alguns macacos. A decoração é um quesito à parte: conta com obras de arte contemporâneas, junto a antiguidades colecionadas pelo idealizador. As piscinas são muito agradáveis, o café da manhã é bom (algumas opções num cardápio fechado) e os funcionários, gentis. Vale a pena ficar um pouco distante do buchicho para curtir a natureza aqui. Outro diferencial é que indicaram um ótimo motorista (Made), que nos proporcionou passeios privados. O único problema é o chuveiro -- muito alto, com pouca água e que acaba por molhar muito o piso fora do box.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Há um real problema com o chuveiro. Foi instalado num box, embora seja um modelo para banheira. Então, está muito alto e a vazão é pequena. Além disso, a água se espalha por todo o piso, pois o box não é fechado. Acabamos por tomar mais banhos na torneira (da banheira que não existe), onde a água escoava melhor. Um item para ser corrigido.

propertyResponse:

reviewTextParts.Disliked: Not clean hotel.you cant guess how many people sleep your pillow they are not clean. Everything is broken and duvet was three piece and you dont sleep in it it sleep in you.it was not a comfortable rooom

reviewTextParts.Liked: The views
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The room wasn't clean, Facilities not good- personal soaps etc in bathroom were not good.Bed very small for the size of the room.

reviewTitle: amazing view gives you the feeling of traditional Bali architecture. poor quality breakfast.

reviewTextParts.Liked: view was amazing. staff were friendly and helpful. spacious room. Location was 15 min drive from Ubud center.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: Bathroom was dirty when we arrived. there was dust everywhere. toilet seat was dirty and we had to wipe it with wipes. breakfast had limited options. One day they were out of bread.

reviewTextParts.Liked: Amazing resort for art lovers and to see Bali from the mountain perspective!  Friendly owner and staff.  Great breakfast included in our stay.
reviewTextParts.Disliked: The room needs a good reading area and light for evenings.

reviewTextParts.Liked: The staff were lovely
reviewTextParts.Disliked: It was the most expensive place I've stayed while travelling and probably the most uncomfortable.
